Spring Rolls: Enough – Spring roll wrappers or egg roll wrappers

Filling: Heat oil in a skillet or wok over high heat
Add garlic, then add pork; breaking it up as it cooks until it turns white
Add carrot, bean sprouts, cabbage, and mushrooms, cook for 3 minutes until veggies are wilted
Add cornflour, soy sauce, and oyster sauce and cook for 1 minute until liquid is gone; filling shouldn’t be watery, it should be sticky
Spring Rolls: Mix cornflour and water in a small bowl for sealing the rolls
Carefully peal off one spring roll wrapper
Place the wrapper with the smooth side down
Place a heaped dessert spoon of filing on the bottom
Roll half way, fold sides in, and finished rolling
Pour enough oil in walk or saucepan so its double the height of the spring rolls
heat on medium high until hot
Carefully place spring rolls in oil, cook and turn occasionally until deep golden, around 1 -2 minutes
Sweet and Sour Sauce: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan over medium heat
Bring to simmer, stirring regularly, then simmer until it thickens to taste, 3-5 minutes
